message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $8,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $9,000. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. Can you meet me at that price?
